alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Broadwater; Gallatin; Jefferson; Madison; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 4:41PM MST until March 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM WEDNESDAY TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central and southwest Montana. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 AM MST Wednesday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 5 AM Wednesday to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead; Broadwater; Gallatin; Jefferson; Madison; Meagher
